content.para: The 3.4.3 release publishes JARs in Maven central repository. Please see the downloads page for the dependency declaration. Release 3.4.3 is functionally identical with the 3.4.2.
content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.4.3. For more new features, please see release 3.4.0 and release 3.3.0 notes.
